ul.li: The civil architecture of Vitruvius [microform] : comprising those books of the author which relate to the public and private edifices of the ancients / translated by William Wilkins ... with an introduction, containing an historical view of the rise and progress of architecture amongst the Greeks.

The civil architecture of Vitruvius : comprising those books of the author which relate to the public and private edifices of the ancients / tr. by William Wilkins ; with an introduction, containing an historical view of the rise and progress of architecture amongst the Greeks.
